Articles.Content:
anyone else having significant issues right clicking on parts to interact with them?

(x64 version)
That's a known issue with the 64-bit Windows build. There's currently no real way for the devteam to address it, as it relates to timing issues in the Unity engine itself.

Maybe not right-clicking. I have a tendancy to accidentally disassemble major portions of whatever I'm building when I use any menus in the VAB. I don't know why KSP lets you select parts when pushing buttons on the menus. It's just about unavoidable at times.
Yes, this is a known issue, and it will be addressed in turn. There is already a thread or two about it in the bug reports section.
